item.title: Hello Blogdown!

To be honest, it was not my first choice. Jekyll was #1 given itâ€™s good support by GitHub pages. Then I took a dive with Pelican. Both are impressive, but both brought equally painful theming: the base theme sort of works, and only sort of, but anyway was not what I wanted.
